Metadata.title: Yaroslav Dolhushyn — Full-Stack Engineer
Metadata.description: Full-Stack Engineer based in Germany. Building scalable web & mobile products with TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Node.js.

Hero.name: Yaroslav Dolhushyn
Hero.subtitle: I turn ideas into production-ready apps — from pixel-perfect frontends to resilient backend systems. TypeScript everywhere.

About.label: About
About.title: About Me
About.description: I've shipped 7+ commercial products reaching over 100K users — cutting load times by 40%, reducing infrastructure costs, and building everything from AI-powered voice apps to high-traffic video platforms. I care about code that lasts and teams that grow.
About.bio1: My sweet spot is owning features end-to-end: designing the API, building the React or React Native UI, setting up the AWS infrastructure, and making sure it all holds up under real traffic. I've led small teams, mentored juniors, and debugged production issues at 2 AM — the full startup experience.
About.bio2: Now based in Sangerhausen, Germany with full working rights (§24). I'm looking for a team that ships fast, cares about quality, and builds products people actually use. Open to on-site, hybrid, or remote across Germany.

items.0: AI & Voice Advisory App (Tech Lead): Architected a React Native & Nest.js platform. Enabled voice consultations and AI advice via OpenAI with custom prompting pipelines.
items.1: Creative Design Platform: Engineered a headless video rendering engine using Puppeteer, Express, and Nginx for server-side React animation rendering.
items.2: Entertainment & Media: Scaled a multi-platform ecosystem to 70,000+ users across React Native apps and admin panels. Integrated AI-driven features, NestJS APIs, cloud functions, and payments via Stripe & PayPal.
items.3: Video Course Platform: Handled 2,000+ users and 700+ paid subscriptions in 6 hours using optimized DB indexing and caching.
items.4: E-commerce Migration: Migrated React to Next.js. Improved LCP/CLS by 40% and reduced hosting costs by 17%.
items.5: Technical Leadership: Standardized CI/CD pipelines, linting rules, and reusable templates across projects.

Projects.label: Work
Projects.title: Featured Projects
Projects.subtitle: A selection of commercial products I've built and shipped.

0.title: AI & Voice Advisory App
0.description: Architected a full-stack platform enabling voice consultations stored on AWS S3 and AI-powered advice via OpenAI with custom prompting pipelines. Led the SDLC as Tech Lead, driving architectural decisions, overseeing delivery, and mentoring a junior engineer.

1.title: Entertainment & Media Platform
1.description: Helped scale a live creator-brand marketplace to 70,000+ users by transitioning critical parts of the platform from a no-code setup to a robust full-stack architecture. Contributed to rebuilding brand-facing flows, backend services, and monetization systems to support long-term growth.

2.title: E-commerce Next.js Migration
2.description: Migrated a legacy React SPA to Next.js. Improved Core Web Vitals (LCP/CLS) by 40% and reduced hosting costs by 17% through Docker containerization. Mentored a junior engineer on Next.js best practices and performance optimization.

3.title: Video Course Platform
3.description: Subscription-based learning platform that handled 2,000+ users and 700+ paid subscriptions in just 6 hours after launch. Achieved through optimized DB indexing and caching strategies. Custom NestJS APIs and Stripe integration for seamless payments.

4.title: Headless Video Rendering Engine
4.description: Built a server-side video rendering engine powering a Canva-like design platform. Executed client-side React animations via Puppeteer, Express, and Nginx, exposing a robust polling API for reliable MP4 exports under high load.

5.title: Internal CRM Platform
5.description: Owned mentorship and technical guidance for 6 interns, conducting thorough code reviews and providing actionable feedback to accelerate their growth. Drove launch readiness by stabilizing new features, and supporting deployment processes. 3 mentees were successfully hired as full-time engineers.

6.title: Healthcare SaaS Refactor
6.description: Delivered a full platform refactor, improving code maintainability, scalability, and overall performance. Re-architected the signup flow by optimizing validation logic, reducing friction points, and streamlining user onboarding — resulting in increased conversion rates and improved system reliability.

7.title: Event & Community Platform
7.description: Assisted in developing marketplace features connecting brands with vetted local communities (run clubs, pilates collectives, studios), enabling authentic partnerships. Quickly onboarded into the codebase and supported feature delivery under tight deadlines during a short-term engagement.
